subject: Re: [junit] My world is realer than your world
msgSnippet: ... Point taken. That s why I prefer to be a blogger and not a journalist, although both activities like to resort to sensationalism to draw readership :-) --
messageBody:
On 6/15/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
>
>
> I find it sloppy to generalize to an entire community based on the
> actions of a few. That's what you seem to be doing. I find it sloppy to
> claim that there's nothing in the literature that talks about testing
> real J2EE applications, when clearly there is. I further find it sloppy
> to appeal to the reasoning of other sloppy thinkers, no matter how many
> of them happen to agree with you.


Point taken.

That's why I prefer to be a blogger and not a journalist, although both
activities like to resort to sensationalism to draw readership :-)

--
Cédric
http://testng.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
